amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill to be used for military construction for the Naval Nuclear Power Propulsion Training Center in Charleston, Sout Carolina.

action.text: Mr. Packard raised a point of order against the McCollum amendment (A001). Mr. Packard stated that the amendment proposed to make changes to existing law and constituted legislation on an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
